item.title: Covid19 Data Source for India & Global
item.description: Hi Guys, I am trying to listing all data source & endpoints for COVID19 - India as well as Global. It can contains offical or unofficial APIs. Anyone is working on any COVID19 project for India, Can use these sources. APIs 1. Github: amodm/api-covid19-in (India) Repo: https://github.com/amodm/api-covid19-in APIs available: Statewise Data StateWise StateWise History Medica Hospital Stats Bed Stats Contacts HelpLines Contacts Patient Tracing History Sources The source is both types of official & Unofficial.
